body_html:
@vrv Thank you very much! That seems to get me one step closer, but when I specify DecodeJpeg as my input node, and then try to import the graph I get the following error:

ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node u'Cast': Input tensor 'DecodeJpeg:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type uint8.

Cast is the node that DecodeJpeg feeds into. When I set Cast as my input node it works fine though, so

[EDIT]: Nevermind, I see I forgot to supply the type variable, passing in uint8 as the type fixed that error (duh...)

body:
@vrv Thank you very much! That seems to get me one step closer, but when I specify DecodeJpeg as my input node, and then try to import the graph I get the following error:

ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node u'Cast': Input tensor 'DecodeJpeg:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type uint8.

Cast is the node that DecodeJpeg feeds into. When I set Cast as my input node it works fine though, so 

[EDIT]: Nevermind, I see I forgot to supply the type variable, passing in uint8 as the type fixed that error (duh...)
